title: Rough the Type - new from Tour De Force FF
content:
One more font in this month from Tour De Force FF:  
**Rough the Type** font

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020224936im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Typophile_RTT_Promo_1_6122.png)

Only in one weight, SmallCaps, basic Latin/English leters.  
Cyrilic glypsh are still in development.  
Price: $15 at MyFonts

More at:  
 [Rough the Type @ MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020224936/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/tdf/rough-the-type/).  
 [Rough the Type @ Tour De Force](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020224936/http:/www.tourdefonts.com/catalog_rough_the_type.html).

Dusan Jelesijevic
author: tourdeforce
